attributes.action: give the English and Welsh the statutory right of responsible access to almost all land and water - the same rights our Scottish relations already enjoy.  The onus being on the general public to behave responsibly and to take due care on privately owned land.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The "right to roam" is a complete whitewash in England and Wales. There are absolutely no new areas I can walk legally in my area - the maps only show areas which were already open to the general public - what a sham.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
